School Overview

Welcome to Himalaya Public School

Nurturing curious minds and shaping future leaders with a holistic approach to learning and personal growth.

Explore ProgramsApply Now

About Himalaya Public School

Established in 2005, Himalaya Public School is a hub of academic excellence and character development. We provide a supportive, student-centered environment that encourages interactive learning and technological orientation.

Our mission is to equip students with the skills and values needed to succeed in an ever-changing world. We believe in nurturing not just scholars, but well-rounded, compassionate individuals.

Meet Our Team

Why Choose Himalaya?

Academic Excellence

A rigorous curriculum and dedicated faculty ensure a top-tier educational experience.

Holistic Development

We focus on the all-round development of students, including arts, sports, and life skills.

Vibrant Community

A supportive and inclusive community where every student feels valued and can thrive.

Our Programs

From foundational learning to advanced specialization, our programs are designed for every stage of your child's educational journey.

Primary School
Grades 1-5. Building strong foundations in a nurturing environment.
Learn More
Middle School
Grades 6-8. Fostering critical thinking and deeper subject understanding.
Learn More
High School
Grades 9-12. Preparing for board exams and future career paths.
Learn More
Tech Programs
Specialized courses in Coding, Robotics, and Computer Literacy.

Vibrant School Life

Life at Himalaya Public School is a rich tapestry of learning, creativity, and fun. We offer a wide range of activities beyond the classroom.

Sports & Athletics

Promoting fitness, teamwork, and sportsmanship through various sports.

Arts & Culture

Encouraging creativity through music, dance, drama, and visual arts.

Clubs & Events

From science fairs to debate clubs, there's something for every interest.
